reviews.review: HL2 is quite possibly the best game I have ever played. I beat it on PS3 (The Orange Box) and was worn out by the end. It has a bit of everything sci-fi shooter fans could want. This is a LONG game so dig in for the long haul if you decide to start Gordon's journey.
Half-Life 2, just WOW. This game is so great, I can replay this over and over and over without the value demishing at all. 10/10
A recommended game.

This game is phenominal. Just a few months ago I did a straight-shot single-sitting playthrough of HL1. It's amazing to see what was done with the story, new characters and where they took the HL franchise. If you don't own this already I can't stress enough how great the Half-Life series is!! Gordon Freeman is the ebodiment of the silent protagonist and Half-Life 2 takes you on a very solid, very polish FPS adventure. If you're not satisfied after playing this (and the DLC Episodes I'm about to recommend) then feel free to chew me out directly ;)
This is Half Life 2, everyone who enjoys PC gaming should play it :)
This game is a true classic. Anyone who likes single-player FPS campaigns should play this and the episodes before they die.

Лучшая игра 1998-2014. В ней не только замечательный геймплей, но и отличный сюжет, который разворачивается по ходу игры.
Продолжение игры Half-LIfe. Гордон Фримен помещён в Стазис G-Man'ом. После катастрофы в Чёрной Мезе начались Портальные Штормы. В связи с этим, на Землю вторглись инопланетные захватчики, именуемые Альянсом. Началась война, названная впоследствии Семичасовой. Альянс победил и захватил власть на Земле. Их наместником стал доктор Брин - бывший Администратор Чёрной Мезы. Люди стали "заложниками" собственной планеты, а те, кто не разделяет власть Альянса, создали организацию под названием "Сопротивление", под предводительством Илая Вэнса.
Спустя 20 лет, G-Man пробуждает Гордона Фримена и отправляет его в центр власти Альянса - город City 17. Являясь легендой граждан City 17 и символом свободы, Гордон саботирует город, и начинается полномасштабное восстание. Гордон Фримен должен добраться до доктора Брина и остановить оккупацию Земли.

Обновлено:
В этом году игре исполняется 14 лет, но она по-прежнему лучшая в своём жанре. Также, у первой Half-Life в этом году юбилей - 20 лет! С Днём Рождения, великая Вселенная!!!

Těšil jsem se na Doom 3 a HL2 mě moc nezajmal, protože neměl dynamický stíny. Když to vyšlo, tak jsem otočil o 180 stupňů. Doom 3 bylo jen zase další sterilní satanistický tech demo ID softwaru, ale HL2 byla naprostá bomba díky detailnosti konceptu světa Města 17 a všeho kolem.
Best game ever.

One of the best first person games to come out. Great story, awesome weapons, graphics stand up even to today's standards. I have replayed this game many times, and enjoy it more and more every time I play. Some of the Steam Achievements can be a little tough to get (ex. going through Ravenholm with only the gravity gun), but still an awesome game. One of my all-time favorites!

Half Life 2. There's nothing I can say that  nobody else has already said. This game is amazing and incredible. It deserves so many awards and so much praise. I could write forever on this thing, but I'll leave it at this: 

Buy this game.

I revisited HL2 just recently and it holds up so well. The physics simulation in this game is still fantastic! Blowing up striders, helicopters, and combine soldiers is just so satisfying. The story is a big improvement from Half-Life 1, in that you are part of a rebel movement, a fight against the forces of oppression, rather than merely trying to survive. The characters are enjoyable, and the dialogue is funny. The sound design is still evocative and every gun, alarm, and machine hum is perfect. There isn't a week point, even years later. The graphics might seem a little dated but the art design makes up for it. If you like sci-fi action then play this game!
We meet again G-man, anyways this game is really good so why not buy,FPS, random shit? whats not to love xD

July 2012: The first time I installed Half-Life 2. I've had this game for over a year unplayed and wow have I been unaware of what a treasure I purchased. I am amazed that a game developed in 2004 can still go toe-to-toe with games in the same genre today. I'll admit, it feels strange playing a game from yesteryear, but I cannot express how much I'm enjoying this game. Sure the graphics are beginning to show age, but had I purchased this game eight years ago, I would have called it revolutionary. 

Very smooth gameplay, excellent in game physics,  shockingly enticing & addictive methods of punishment, persistently dynamic & imaginative storyline, appropriate learning curve, and lovely voice actors. 

Final rating~ 10/10

This game is a must own - must play - for anyone who loves First Person Shooters, especially ones reminiscent of the '90s FPS (lol Duke Nukem Forever, I'm sorry for you).

Continuing its predecessor, Half-Life 2 shows a significant evolution with the new Source graphics engine, which is also marks presence in other games made ​​by Valve, like Counter Strike Source, Day of Defeat Source and Portal.

For those who enjoy a classic game as Half-life, this can not miss in your collection.

Amazing sequel to the amazing original. New engine allows so much more fun with physics. This is also the first game in which there is a physics gun (a gun that allows you to grab objects and push objects) as a gameplay element. I also like that you won't get extremely confused with the story if you play this game without playing the first game, although i suggest you play both.
I love the story line, buy this one for sure!

This game offers a storyline that is jam-packed with action, the atmosphere is so real that this has to be one of the best games ever created, I mean it. It feels like you are there. You can't pick up cans in COD. But you can in HL2!

Credo sia abbastanza superfluo scrivere una recensione per questo gioco. Ha accompagnato la maggior parte di noi durante la nostra vita videoludica facendoci sognare, piangere, emozionare... Gordon Freeman è riuscito a far breccia nelle nostre menti e nei nostri cuori facendoci vivere una delle più belle avventure mai create. Ora non c'è che da aspettare il terzo capitolo della serie (se mai verrà prodotto...). Per tutti quelli che hanno mancato questa perla non c'è altro da fare che iniziare questo capitolo e portarlo avanti fino alla fine. Buona giocata.
Best FPS of all time and one of the best games of all time! One of the best evidence that games are art!
Great older game that keeps it together even this many years after release, make sure to grab on sale.
